QuestData.Title: Distorted by the Maw
QuestData.Description:
Lysonia's forces are rerouting the anima collectors to spew Maw energy across the temple. They hamper our forces while strengthening their own.
The collectors have been tainted. Take Compassion and destroy them to halt Lysonia's boon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Anima Collectors in the Terrace of Inner Grace.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kleia at the Terrace of Inner Grace.
